          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring the acceleration of a trolley: a single light gate setup</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen der Beschleunigung einer Laufkatze: 
eine einzelne helle Gatterinstallation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de l'accélération d'un chariot : 
une installation légère simple de porte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medindo o acceleration de um trole: uma 
única instalação clara da porta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misurazione dell'accelerazione di un carrello: 
una singola messa a punto chiara del cancello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της ταχύτητας ενός καροτσακιού: μια 
ενιαία ελαφριά οργάνωση πυλών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medir la aceleración de una carretilla: 
una sola disposición ligera de la puerta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates a laboratory experiment for measuring the acceleration of a trolley by using a single light gate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interrupt card</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trolley</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Laborexperiment für das
Messen der Beschleunigung einer Laufkatze, indem sie ein einzelnes 
helles Gatter verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre une expérience de 
laboratoire pour mesurer l'accélération d'un chariot en utilisant 
une porte légère simple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra uma experiência do 
laboratório para medir o acceleration de um trole usando uma única 
porta clara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra un esperimento del 
laboratorio per la misurazione dell'accelerazione di un carrello 
usando un singolo cancello chiaro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ένα εργαστηριακό 
πείραμα για τη μέτρηση της ταχύτητας ενός καροτσακιού με τη 
χρησιμοποίηση μιας ενιαίας ελαφριάς πύλης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra un experimento del 
laboratorio para medir la aceleración de una carretilla usando una 
sola puerta ligera.</string>
          </description>
